job_tasks.phrase: As a front-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of a front-end engineer, which is to make the work of other team members (backend, data scientists) accessible to customers, a clear software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: The functionality you'll be building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the development of new features and functionalities, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the goal of building and integrating GenAI concepts into a usable product, which is a software development and integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value.
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing new interfaces and exploring techniques to improve user experience and product adoption, which are software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the need to tailor the GenAI concept to a specific business domain, indicating an understanding of business needs and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions working closely with other teams (product management, data scientists, back-end engineers), which is a clear indicator of communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on front-end engineering tasks (exposing functionality, building interfaces, ensuring customer adoption) which fall under Macro-Category A (Software Development & Integration). While it mentions 'generative AI' as the technology concept, the core responsibilities described are about building the user-facing application and integrating the AI functionality, rather than developing or fine-tuning the AI models themselves (Macro-Category B). The role is about making AI accessible to customers through the front-end, aligning with the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly defines the role as 'Front End Developer' and outlines responsibilities related to building user interfaces and integrating functionality. While it mentions 'generative AI', the focus remains on the software engineering aspect of exposing this technology to customers. The lack of specific AI/ML model development tasks or technologies prevents a higher score, but the core software engineering responsibilities are clear.
